name: Stench Projector, Disposable (DSPj-15)
description: Disposable version of the stench projector This weapon projects a foul-smelling or obnoxious effect at the target. This version is constructed of relatively inexpensive materials and has a working lifetime measured in days.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
